question: 唯一
sourceMnemonic: It's <kanji>solely</kanji> <kanji>one</kanji>. The <vocabulary>only</vocabulary> one. The <vocabulary>sole</vocabulary> one. Totally <vocabulary>unique</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading for <ja>唯</ja> is the same as the one you learned with the kanji, though there is also a shortened version which has <ja>ゆい</ja> shortened to <ja>ゆ</ja>. The reading for <ja>一</ja> is one you haven't learned yet, wow! You're finally going to learn the second, rare on'yomi reading for <ja>一</ja>! It wants to be the <vocabulary>only</vocabulary> reading now, so it <reading>eats</reading> (<ja>いつ</ja>) the other one. Oh no, you can't remember that other reading now. <ja>いつ</ja> is the <vocabulary>sole</vocabulary> <ja>一</ja> reading in your brain!
